text.__SUMMARY__:
Dendrobium thyrsiflorum is a species of orchid, commonly called the pinecone-like raceme dendrobium. It is native to the Himalayas (Bhutan, Assam, Yunnan and Arunachal Pradesh) as well as to the mountains of northern Indochina (Myanmar, Thailand, Laos and Vietnam).Two varieties are recognized:
Dendrobium thyrsiflorum var. minutiflorum Aver. - Laos
Dendrobium thyrsiflorum var. thyrsiflorum - most of species range
